channel.title: iClarity V2.0 - Perfect Melee Combat [Still In development]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/iClaritylogo.png[/img]
iClarity: Version 2.0
This version contains nothing near what I aim to create, it is still under majour development. I'm releasing this version now because I see that a lot of people are downloading my V1.05 server, which contains loads of bugs and flaws. Most of all, this is a base for you to use; it's not a server that you can just change stuff and run as an official server or whatever.
Note: The client doesn't contain the cache - The cache will automatically download once you start the client.
Server Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/iClarity%20v2.0.zip]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/iClarity%20v2.0.zip[/url] Client Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/iClarity%20Client%20v2.0.zip]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/iClarity%20Client%20v2.0.zip[/url]
[size=14pt][U][B]Features[/B][/U][/size]
[B][U]Client[/U][/B]
[ul][li]Simple packaging.[/li] [li]Some newer animations added. These include vengeance, rune defender blocking animation, karils X bow attack animation, the newer whip animation, and several others.[/li] [li]Clipped following is done via the client: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q[/url][/li] [li]Fully working client updating. You can change the links for the online version files/client downloads, or you can keep them the same so you can update the client whenever I update it.[/li] [li]Fully working cache downloading; all you need to do is change the link to the cache file download.[/li] [li]459 Equipment interface and Prayer interfaces.[/li] [li]New client background, title box and login button.[/li] [li]Cache size has been reduced by around 4mb.[/li] [li]Music is enabled via the client - All you need to do is send the ID's via the server and it will play.[/li] [li]The Runescape theme song plays automatically upon start-up. Scroll down for information on disabling it.[/li] [li]All items in the client are exact to runescape's ID's.[/li][/ul]
[B][U]Server[/U][/B]
[ul][li]Fully working clipped following. Most of the work is done via the client.[/li] [li]Perfect melee combat with following, attack/defence bonuses, perfect max hit formula, and special attacks. Skulling isn't created in this version.[/li] [li]Ranging combat has been begun on, it's not fully functional yet though.[/li] [li]Perfect dialogue system - All you need to do is add your dialogue values/data into the 2 dimensional array in the Dialogue class and it will work. (You will also need to add the dialogue continuation in the DialoguePacket class).[/li] [li]Perfectly working prayer. Not all prayer effects are created yet, though all melee prayers (Attack/defence/strength boosting & protection prayers).[/li] [li]Exact prayer draining formula - Prayer drains exactly the same as Runescape.[/li] [li]Major NPC Updating bug fixed.[/li] [li]Perfect special bar sending/updating. It only shows when you are using a weapon that does/should have a special attack.[/li] [li]Run energy gaining and draining works.[/li] [li]Special attack power gaining is exact to runescape (10 every 30 seconds). Special attack amount doesn't save to the character file yet though.[/li] [li]Clothes types now save and load to/from your character file. The character changing screen works fully also.[/li] [li]All emotes on the emote interface work.[/li][/ul]
For more information about features and to follow the development of iClarity, visit this topic: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=210935]http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=210935[/url]
[size=14pt][U][B]Media[/B][/U][/size]
[U]Fully working Prayer with perfect draining, headicons and switching[/U] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx1HZi5Xrdw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx1HZi5Xrdw[/url]
[U]Clipped Following[/U] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q[/url]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/Client.png[/img]
Whip [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/Whip.gif[/img]
Dragon dagger special attack [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/Dds%20spec.gif[/img]
Dragon longsword special attack [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/D%20long.gif[/img]
Dragon Mace special attack [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/D%20mace.gif[/img]
Equipment Screen [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/EquipmentScreen-1.png[/img]
Perfect equipment removing when wielding a shield/2h weapon [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/EquipmentRemoving.gif[/img]

Loving it mate! Just getting back into RSPS after like 2 years break >.< Soooo much has changed!
This’ll be my next server base, if i can figuire out all this new mumbo jumbo folder thingo thumbs up

Specials are perfect! PvP is very nice so far, although no auto retaliate. Also no death Don’t forget them hehe.

OleanPkz:

I also want to remove PVP, I want it only PKing in the wildy, how do I do this?
